mapper.select: SELECT apilist.API_LIST_ID API_LIST_ID , API_NM , PRV_ORG , API_VIEW , API_RGDT , COUNT_API_USES FROM API_LIST apilist INNER JOIN API_USER_INTRS aui ON apilist.API_LIST_ID = aui.API_LIST_ID AND aui.USER_ID = (select USER_ID from USER where Email = #{email}) AND aui.STCD = '01' LEFT JOIN (SELECT API_LIST_ID , COUNT(*) COUNT_API_USES FROM API_USES GROUP BY API_LIST_ID) apiuses ON apilist.API_LIST_ID = apiuses.API_LIST_ID
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO API_USES (USER_ID, API_LIST_ID, API_VIEW_DATE) VALUES (#{arg0}, #{arg1}, DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s'))
INSERT INTO API_USER_INTRS (USER_ID, API_LIST_ID, STCD) VALUES (#{arg0}, #{arg1.apilistid}, #{arg1.stcd})
